name: Jason Wolfe
text: Don't waste your time. Drive to the other Little Caesar's a few miles down the road. …More

name: Thomas Swinson
text: It gets 1 star because zero isn't an option. So their pizza aren't hot and ready (even though their sign says it is) and they don't tell you till after you paid and can't refund you there they say you have to go to the Kmart customer …More

name: Dawn Tacker
text: Ordered 2 supreme pizzas tonight. When brought home the pizza boxes on bottom was wet and pizzas were not cooked. Called the store the woman said she was a manager and when I told her how the pizza’s looked she said supremes are hard to …More

name: Aaron Martin
text: Staff was nice but the pizza is terrible. Undercooked and not even cut all the way through. Extremely doughy and greasy. When I tried to pull a slice out of the box all the toppings slid right off. The 2 stars are only because the staff was nice.

name: April McGee
text: Fast and Friendly with good eats.

name: Megan H
text: Good pizza at a great price!

name: Stacy Hunt
text: They used to be really good, but they have gone down hill. We used to eat here 4 times a month but the quality is horrible now, they just don't seem to care and it shows!!

name: CP Williams
text: Let's start with 'IT's Little Caesars!" Crazy bread and all the rest stuck in the corner of Walmart. What a nutty place to put a pizza joint but they almost always have up what I need and for $5 you grab a large pizza and go! …More

name: adam jackson
text: $5 dollar pizza is fine for the kids.  Neither Springfield location will honor gift cards.

name: renae rogers
text: Some of the best pizza ever.

name: James Swiger
text: Stood there for 10 minutes before they took our order, then had to wait 20 minutes for a deep dish that was supposed to be hot-n-ready. There were no other customers ahead of us. I won't be back.

name: Shellie Anders
text: The pizza is cheap and good but I walked up to the counter and the lady just turned around and started to draw on paper then 4 mins later she turn and ask if  she could help me , I said ya but u could of helped me 5 mins ago!

name: Nick
text: Called like 3 times around 5:30 pm and it just rings and rings and rings. I guess they dont want my business.

name: Whatever this is Called
text: At 546pm workers were closing refused to sell me piZza and called before I went he said they close at 8pm sign even said open till 8pm waste of gas n time
